alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 2:22AM MST until December 27 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...The Winter Weather Advisory has been cancelled as the threat for freezing rain has ended. Patchy freezing drizzle will remain possible throughout the day creating potential slick road conditions. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy wet mountain snow and mix of heavy valley rain and wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet with 2 to 6 inches in the valleys below. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
